column4: hi guys, i'm having trouble deleting files on a memory card. get get them out of trash bin as root or user. is there a way to batch chmod them from terminal so i can delete them?
are the files owned by root? meaning only root can delete them?
no they're owned by the user but i can't get rid of them
i could of formatted the card fresh but it also won't let me copy files i need on the card to backup first
